title.en: Having Naughty Thoughts? The Sweetest, Most Luxurious Massage!

altTitles.ja: 今エッチな想像した？ なんでも屋のくちゅ甘極上マッサージ（単話）

description.en: After being assigned her first article in the women’s magazine she works for, Hina Kuramoto arranges a massage with masseuse Yosuke from the “Anything-You-Wish” service for said article. Hina has some reservations about the massage her due to issues she has had with men in the past, but when the gorgeous masseuse runs his big and warm hands all over her body and cuddles with her, Hina relaxes and all of her worries soon melt away... After the interview, Yosuke gives Hina his personal number and tells her to call him any time she needs something. Hina hesitates at first, but later calls Yosuke to ask him to protect her from a potential stalker. In exchange, Yosuke asks her for a homecooked meal and... her body!?
